00137         public function put_attributes($domain_name, $item_name, $keypairs, $replace = null, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00138         {
00139                 $opt = array();
00140                 $opt['DomainName'] = $domain_name;
00141                 $opt['ItemName'] = $item_name;
00142                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00143 
00144                 $count = 0;
00145                 foreach ($keypairs as $k => $v)
00146                 {
00147                         $opt['Attribute.' . (string) $count . '.Name'] = $k;
00148                         $opt['Attribute.' . (string) $count . '.Value'] = $v;
00149                         $count++;
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 if ($replace)
00153                 {
00154                         $opt['Attribute.Replace'] = 'true';
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 return $this->authenticate('PutAttributes', $opt, SDB_DEFAULT_URL);
00158         }
00159 
00176         public function get_attributes($domain_name, $item_name, $keys = null, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00177         {
00178                 $opt = array();
00179                 $opt['DomainName'] = $domain_name;
00180                 $opt['ItemName'] = $item_name;
00181                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00182 
00183                 if ($keys)
00184                 {
00185                         if (is_array($keys))
00186                         {
00187                                 $count = 0;
00188                                 foreach ($keys as $key)
00189                                 {
00190                                         $opt['AttributeName.' . (string) $count] = $key;
00191                                         $count++;
00192                                 }
00193                         }
00194                         else
00195                         {
00196                                 $opt['AttributeName'] = $keys;
00197                         }
00198                 }
00199 
00200                 return $this->authenticate('GetAttributes', $opt, SDB_DEFAULT_URL);
00201         }
00202 
00219         public function delete_attributes($domain_name, $item_name, $keys = null, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00220         {
00221                 $opt = array();
00222                 $opt['DomainName'] = $domain_name;
00223                 $opt['ItemName'] = $item_name;
00224                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00225 
00226                 // Do we have a key?
00227                 if ($keys)
00228                 {
00229                         // An array?
00230                         if (is_array($keys))
00231                         {
00232                                 // Indexed array of Attribute Names?
00233                                 if ($this->util->ready($keys[0]))
00234                                 {
00235                                         for ($x = 0, $i = count($keys); $x < $i; $x++)
00236                                         {
00237                                                 $opt['Attribute.' . (string) $i . '.Name'] = $keys[$i];
00238                                         }
00239                                 }
00240 
00241                                 // Associative array of Name/Value pairs.
00242                                 else
00243                                 {
00244                                         $count = 0;
00245                                         foreach ($keys as $k => $v)
00246                                         {
00247                                                 $opt['Attribute.' . (string) $count . '.Name'] = $k;
00248                                                 $opt['Attribute.' . (string) $count . '.Value'] = $v;
00249                                                 $count++;
00250                                         }
00251                                 }
00252                         }
00253 
00254                         // Single string Attribute Name.
00255                         else
00256                         {
00257                                 $opt['Attribute.Name'] = $keys;
00258                         }
00259                 }
00260 
00261                 return $this->authenticate('DeleteAttributes', $opt, SDB_DEFAULT_URL);
00262         }

00287         public function query($domain_name, $opt = null, $expression = null, $follow = null)
00288         {
00289                 $opt = array();
00290                 $opt['DomainName'] = $domain_name;
00291                 $opt['QueryExpression'] = $expression;
00292 
00293                 $query = $this->authenticate('Query', $opt, SDB_DEFAULT_URL);
00294 
00295                 if ($follow)
00296                 {
00297                         $handles = array();
00298 
00299                         foreach ($query->body->QueryResult->ItemName as $item)
00300                         {
00301                                 $handles[] = $this->get_attributes($domain_name, $item, null, true);
00302                         }
00303 
00304                         $request = new $this->request_class(null);
00305                         return $request->sendMultiRequest($handles);
00306                 }
00307 
00308                 return $query;
00309         }
